title: The ONE Group operates multiple restaurant websites
statement: The ONE Group operates websites including togrp.com, stksteakhouse.com, benihana.com, konagrill.com, rasushi.com, samurairestaurant.com, baoyum.com, and saltwatersocial.com.

citations.quote: during your visits to our websites ( togrp.com ; stksteakhouse.com ; benihana.com ; konagrill.com ; rasushi.com ; samurairestaurant.com ; baoyum.com ; saltwatersocial.com )
